episodes.synopsis: Adopted Mei must confront some difficult questions when she gets an unexpected request from her birth mother to visit her in China.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Mei's birth mother tells her the truth about why she gave her away. Meanwhile, activists step forward to help Mei with her brother's case.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Mei goes undercover in the criminal underworld, risking her life to get critical information that could clear her brother's name.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A man of influence offers Mei a way to save her brother's life, but it involves making another man pay a terrible price.
episodes.title: Episode 4

video.title: One Child
video.synopsis: At the request of her birth mother, adoptee Mei leaves her home in Britain to visit China, where she finds her brother faces an unjust death sentence.
